IF EXISTS (SELECT * FROM dbo.sysobjects WHERE id = object_id(N'dbo.update_guild_member_rank') AND OBJECTPROPERTY(id, N'IsProcedure') = 1) DROP PROCEDURE dbo.update_guild_member_rank GO
CREATE PROCEDURE dbo.update_guild_member_rank @character_id dbo.id_t, @rank_id TINYINT AS SET NOCOUNT ON
UPDATE dbo.Guild_Members SET rank_id = @rank_id WHERE character_id = @character_id
SET NOCOUNT OFF
